All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActivityBearBinding
 
ActivityCurrencyBinding
 
ActivityFlightBinding
 
ActivityMainBinding
 
ActivityQuestionsBinding
 
ActivitySavedFlightsBinding
 
ActivityTriviaBinding
 
BearActivity
Program to generate, save, and view bear images in a database.
BearDetailsFragment
A fragment containing additional details about a bear image object, as well as the GUI functionality to delete the bear image from the images list and the database.
BearDetailsLayoutBinding
 
BearImage
Represents a bear image.
BearImageDAO
An interface for accessing and manipulating the bear image database.
BearImageDatabase
Represents a bear images database.
BearImageRowBinding
 
BearImagesFragment
Represents a list of all bear images in a database, with a GUI for saving the currently generated image to the database.
BearImagesLayoutBinding
 
BearImagesViewModel
A class representing the live and mutable viewModel of the bear images list.
Conversion
The Conversion class represents a conversion object that holds information related to a currency conversion.
ConversionDAO
The ConversionDAO interface defines the Data Access Object (DAO) for the Conversion class.
ConversionDatabase
ConversionDatabase is a Room database class that serves as the database holder for the Conversion objects.
ConversionDetailsFragment
A fragment that displays the details of a conversion and provides options to save, delete, or dismiss the fragment.
ConversionDetailsFragment.OnConversionDeletedListener
Interface to handle the extends deletion of a conversion from the fragment to the deletion from the recycler view.
CurrencyActivity
The CurrencyActivity class represents the main activity of the currency conversion app.
CurrencyActivityViewModel
The CurrencyActivityViewModel class is a ViewModel that holds data related to the CurrencyActivity.
FlightActivity
This page allows the user to search for flights after entering a source airport code.
FlightDatabase
Abstract class defining the database for the flight tracker
FlightDetailsFragment
Class used for displaying the flight info on a fragment
FlightDetailsLayoutBinding
 
FlightInfo
Both the info displayed and the info saved in the database
FlightInfoDAO
DAO interface for the flight tracker
FlightListBinding
 
FlightViewModel
View model for the flight activity
FragmentItemDetailBinding
 
ImgSaver
An interface which mandates the implementation of functionality to save an image from a provided file.
ItemConversionBinding
 
LeaderboardActivity
 
LeaderboardAdapter
 
LeaderboardAdapter.ViewHolder
 
LeaderboardLayoutBinding
 
LeaderboardListBinding
 
MainActivity
 
QuestionAdapter
 
QuestionAdapter.ViewHolder
 
QuestionDetails
 
QuestionsActivity
 
SavedFlightFragment
Fragment containing the info of a saved flight.
SavedFlightsActivity
This page allows users to view their saved flights and click on any of them to view more info
SavedFlightsLayoutBinding
 
TriviaActivity
 
TriviaQuestionLayoutBinding
 
UserScore
 
UserScoreDao
 
UserScoreDatabase
 
UserScoreRepository
